subject: Basketball (College)
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: U.S.C. hired Andy Enfield, who coached the darling of last season’s N.C.A.A. tournament, hoping his high-flying style will resonate in Los Angeles.
snippet: U.S.C. hired Andy Enfield, who coached the darling of last season’s N.C.A.A. tournament, hoping his high-flying style will resonate in Los Angeles.
